action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself and Mr. Perry) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To freeze hiring activities at the United States Agency for Global Media, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Zero Increase in Personnel for Propagandistic Outreach Act or the ZIPPO Act.
Beginning on the date of the enactment of this Actâ€”

paragraph.text: no individual may be appointed to any position within the United States Agency for Global Media;
no new position may be established at the United States Agency for Global Media;
no officer or employee of the United States Agency for Global Media may be assigned any duty not assigned to that officer or employee as of the date of the enactment of this Act; and

no officer or employee of the United States Agency for Global Media may be assigned, detailed, or transferred to a duty station other than the duty station of such officer or employee as of the date of the enactment of this Act.
